document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Diamond Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Diamond Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Diamond Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Diamond Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on [[Ivory Street]], branching south then southwest to cross the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] and eventually end at [[Westwall Street]]. Diamond Street was intersected by [[Delzorin Street]], [[Vondil Street]], [[Chasso's Trot]], the [[Rough Road]], [[Satchel Alley]], [[Seawatch Street]], the [[Street of Whispers]], and [[Pharra's Alley]].
